statements: SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgramData;
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, purchase_amount, loyalty_points, purchase_date FROM LoyaltyProgramData;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, purchase_amount, loyalty_id, purchase_date FROM LoyaltyProgramData;
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_amount, loyalty_points FROM LoyaltyProgramData;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date, loyalty_points FROM LoyaltyProgramData;
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgramData GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(loyalty_points) AS avg_loyalty_points FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date, loyalty_points FROM LoyaltyProgramData ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, last_purchase_date FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount >= 50;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 200;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer JOIN purchase_history ON customer.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program INNER JOIN customer ON loyalty_program.program_id = customer.customer_id;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT reward_name, expiry_date FROM rewards WHERE required_points < 500;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, total_points FROM customers WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount >= 50 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_points, reward_name FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.total_points >= rewards.required_points;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, total_points FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY total_points ASC;
SELECT customer_id, points, tier FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM purchase_history;
SELECT reward_name, points_required, reward_id FROM rewards_catalog;
SELECT customer_id, reward_id, redemption_date FROM redeemed_rewards;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_category, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, points, tier FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, tier, points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE points > 500 ORDER BY tier ASC;
SELECT customer_id, tier, points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE tier = 'Gold' AND points >= 1000;
